name: Orbeus X
description:
A little shmup that I made to learn Unity. It took a while to make because I lost motivation for a bit due to cancer, but here it is!

I tried to make it play in browser, but unfortunately I couldn't get it to work. 

Credit to Juhani Junkala for music.

Controls:

Click play button to start

A/D or arrow keys to move

Space to shoot

Fun fact: this game is actually a sequel t o a game I made in scratch when I was 11 called Orbeus.

I hope you enjoy!
